rnp_protocol.definition: Replace-Not-Patch - Zero-Drift from University Dean specifications
rnp_protocol.action: Full component replacement, not incremental fixes
rnp_protocol.security: Ensures no corrupted logic persists in the stack

problem_statement.root_cause: Legacy UI lacked Anchor-Logic - treated drag as transient event
problem_statement.impact: Architect cannot position agents on canvas grid

v2_features.sovereign_event_listener: Maps GID drag-events to Permanent Ledger draft state
v2_features.drop_as_pac_draft: Drop event treated as PAC-Draft Decision
v2_features.bi_directional_write_back: Node positions persist to backend state
v2_features.anchor_logic: Nodes stay where placed on grid

constitutional_compliance.rnp: Full replacement ensures Zero-Drift from specs
constitutional_compliance.control_autonomy: System recognizes movement as authorized PAC-Draft
constitutional_compliance.fail_closed: Snap-Back was old system failing-closed correctly
